string-array.name: imports_onboarding_google_steps_v2
string-array.item: Please go to \"Settings > Transfer accounts > Export accounts\"
This will create one or more QR codes that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_2fas_steps_v2
string-array.item: This will create a 2fas file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_aegis_steps_v2
string-array.item: Please go to \"Settings > Import & Export > Export\"
This will create a Json file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_bitwarden_steps_v2
string-array.item: This will create a Json file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_ente_steps_v2
string-array.item: Please go to \"Settings > Data > Export codes\"
Choose \"Plain text\", this will create a txt file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_lastpass_steps_v2
string-array.item: Please go to \"Settings > Transfer accounts > Export accounts to file\"
This will create a Json file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_proton_authenticator_steps_v2
string-array.item: This will create a Json file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_proton_pass_steps
string-array.item: In Proton Pass extension, web or desktop app, go to \"Settings > Export\"
Make sure to choose the \"zip format without file attachments\".
This will create a zip file that you can use here.

string-array.name: imports_onboarding_unsupported_steps
string-array.item: Unfortunately, %1$s doesnâ€™t currently support exporting data from their app. Consider contacting %1$s to request this feature.
Please import your data manually for now.
